paragraphs.content: The wilderness and the solitary place shall be glad for them; and the desert shall rejoice, and blossom as the rose.
paragraphs.contentHtml: The wilderness and the solitary place shall be glad for them; and the desert shall rejoice, and blossom as the rose.

paragraphs.content: It shall blossom abundantly, and rejoice even with joy and singing: the glory of Lebanon shall be given unto it, the excellency of Carmel and Sharon, they shall see the glory of the LORD, and the excellency of our God.
paragraphs.contentHtml: It shall blossom abundantly, and rejoice even with joy and singing: the glory of Lebanon shall be given unto it, the excellency of Carmel and Sharon, they shall see the glory of the Lord, and the excellency of our God.

paragraphs.content: ¶ Strengthen ye the weak hands, and confirm the feeble knees.
paragraphs.contentHtml: ¶ Strengthen ye the weak hands, and confirm the feeble knees.

paragraphs.content: Say to them that are of a fearful heart, Be strong, fear not: behold, your God will come with vengeance, even God with a recompence; he will come and save you.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Say to them that are of a fearful heart, Be strong, fear not: behold, your God will come with vengeance, even God with a recompence; he will come and save you.

paragraphs.content: Then the eyes of the blind shall be opened, and the ears of the deaf shall be unstopped.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Then the eyes of the blind shall be opened, and the ears of the deaf shall be unstopped.

paragraphs.content: Then shall the lame man leap as an hart, and the tongue of the dumb sing: for in the wilderness shall waters break out, and streams in the desert.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Then shall the lame man leap as an hart, and the tongue of the dumb sing: for in the wilderness shall waters break out, and streams in the desert.

paragraphs.content: And the parched ground shall become a pool, and the thirsty land springs of water: in the habitation of dragons, where each lay, shall be grass with reeds and rushes.
paragraphs.contentHtml: And the parched ground shall become a pool, and the thirsty land springs of water: in the habitation of dragons, where each lay, shall be grass with reeds and rushes.

paragraphs.content: And an highway shall be there, and a way, and it shall be called The way of holiness; the unclean shall not pass over it; but it shall be for those: the wayfaring men, though fools, shall not err therein.
paragraphs.contentHtml: And an highway shall be there, and a way, and it shall be called The way of holiness; the unclean shall not pass over it; but it shall be for those: the wayfaring men, though fools, shall not err therein.

paragraphs.content: No lion shall be there, nor any ravenous beast shall go up thereon, it shall not be found there; but the redeemed shall walk there:
paragraphs.contentHtml: No lion shall be there, nor any ravenous beast shall go up thereon, it shall not be found there; but the redeemed shall walk there:

paragraphs.content: And the ransomed of the LORD shall return, and come to Zion with songs and everlasting joy upon their heads: they shall obtain joy and gladness, and sorrow and sighing shall flee away.
paragraphs.contentHtml: And the ransomed of the Lord shall return, and come to Zion with songs and everlasting joy upon their heads: they shall obtain joy and gladness, and sorrow and sighing shall flee away.
